featured.text: “I have patchwork pieces that contain all sorts of combinations of fabrics.

definition.zh_def: 拼布，通常指用不同布料縫合而成的物品或設計。
definition.en_def: A type of textile made by sewing together pieces of different fabrics, often used in quilts or decorative items.
definition.example: She created a beautiful patchwork quilt from old clothes.
